advancements.rf.main.root.title: Basics & Progression
advancements.rf.main.root.description: Welcome to Raspberry Flavoured! This is the main progression tree, but after you've gathered some items, three other tabs will become available! For checklist advancements, you can hover over them and hold Shift to see what you're missing!
advancements.rf.main.pickaxe.title: It's in the Name
advancements.rf.main.pickaxe.description: Craft your first Pickaxe out of Planks and Sticks
advancements.rf.main.shield.title: En Garde!
advancements.rf.main.shield.description: Craft a Shield - different types of Shields have different attributes
advancements.rf.main.furnace.title: Hot Topic
advancements.rf.main.furnace.description: Craft and place down a Furnace to process materials
advancements.rf.main.copper_pickaxe.desc: Process Raw Copper into Copper Ingots in a Furnace and use them to craft a Copper Pickaxe
advancements.rf.main.iron.title: Irony
advancements.rf.main.armor.title: Armor Up
advancements.rf.main.lead_poisoning.desc: Get afflicted with the Stunning effect by consuming any food while having Lead-related items in your hotbar or getting splashed with a Potion of Stunning
advancements.rf.main.forge.title: Reforged
advancements.rf.main.forge.description: Place down a Forge to smelt ores faster or create better tools, armor, Enchanted Tablets and unique weapons
advancements.rf.main.bronze.title: Metal of Honor
advancements.rf.main.bronze.description: Alloy Copper, Zinc and Lead to obtain Bronze... or find it somewhere
advancements.rf.main.rose_gold.title: Have No Fear
advancements.rf.main.rose_gold.descripti: Alloy Copper and Gold to obtain Rose Gold... or find it somewhere
advancements.rf.main.pickaxe_upgrade.des: Forge an Iron or higher tier Pickaxe
advancements.rf.main.silver.title: It's No Use!
advancements.rf.main.electrum.title: Gotta Go Fast
advancements.rf.main.electrum.descriptio: Obtain an Electrum Ingot - you're gonna need a Super-Heated Mixer for this one
advancements.rf.main.smithing_table.desc: Place down a Smithing Table to upgrade and enchant various equipment
advancements.rf.main.rose_gold_upgrade.d: Use Rose Gold in a Smithing Table on your Iron equipment - Rose Gold tools drop blocks in their purest form whenever possible and the armor will protect you from magic damage
advancements.rf.main.steel_upgrade.title: Man of Steel
advancements.rf.main.steel_upgrade.descr: Use Steel in a Smithing Table on your Iron tools and Chainmail armor - Steel equipment isn't the fastest but is super durable and knocks foes far away
advancements.rf.main.special_weapons.des: Create all five special modified weapons
advancements.rf.main.enchanted_tablet.de: Find or create any Enchanted Tablet, which you can use to apply enchantments to your equipment at a Smithing Table
Crush a Nether Star into Stardust and use it to forge an Everlasting Tablet
advancements.rf.main.polishing.title: We Are the Crystal Gems
advancements.rf.main.polishing.descripti: Use Sandpaper or a Grindstone to polish Rough Cinnabar, Diamond or Quartz
advancements.rf.main.diamond_armor.title: Cover Me in Diamonds
advancements.rf.main.diamond_armor.descr: Use Mechanical Crafters to create a full set of Diamond armor
advancements.rf.main.electrum_armor.desc: Make a full set of Electrum armor - you'll need to have visited another dimension to make Electrum
advancements.rf.main.necromium_armor.des: Make a full set of Necromium armor - you'll need to have visited another dimension to make Necromium
advancements.rf.main.netherite_armor.des: Make a full set of Netherite armor - you'll need to have visited another dimension to make Netherite
advancements.rf.main.obsidian.title: Sharpen Your Thinking
advancements.rf.main.potion.title: Your Strongest Potions
advancements.rf.main.ancient_debris.desc: Obtain Ancient Debris or Ancient Scrap
advancements.rf.main.necromium.title: Death Metal
advancements.rf.main.necromium.descripti: Obtain a Necromium Ingot - you're gonna need a Super-Heated Mixer for this one
advancements.rf.main.netherite.title: A Blast of Heat
advancements.rf.main.netherite.descripti: Obtain a Netherite Ingot - you're gonna need a Super-Heated Mixer for this one
advancements.rf.main.all_metals.title: Metallic Madness
advancements.rf.farming.root.title: Farming & Foraging
advancements.rf.farming.campfire.title: F-F-Fire!
advancements.rf.farming.campfire.descrip: Make some Campfire Kindling and light it with a Fire Striker or by sneak-right-clicking with Twigs in both hands
advancements.rf.farming.sap.title: Happy Sappy
advancements.rf.farming.sap.description: Right-click on a Sappy Maple Log with a Bottle to obtain Sap, or find a bottle of it somewhere
advancements.rf.farming.bait.title: Is This Bait?
advancements.rf.farming.bait.description: Obtain any kind of fishing bait, be it Worms, Spider Eyes, Fireflies or Caterpillars
advancements.rf.farming.fishing_gear.des: Upgrade to a Reinforced Fishing Rod and place down a Tackle Box, where you can customise your Reinforced Fishing Rod and attach bait to it
advancements.rf.farming.all_fish.title: Master Baiter
advancements.rf.farming.harvest_honey.de: Light a Campfire under a Bee Nest or Hive and then safely harvest the Honey with a Bottle, or some Honeycombs with Shears
advancements.rf.farming.keg.title: Ninety-Nine Bottles
advancements.rf.farming.keg.description: Place down a Keg to make special beverages with unique effects and other fun preserved foods
advancements.rf.farming.pizza_time.title: Pizza Time Never Ends
advancements.rf.farming.pizza_time.descr: Have a stack of Pizza Slices in your inventory
advancements.rf.farming.happy_hour.title: It's Happy Hour!
advancements.rf.farming.happy_hour.descr: Consume everything that afflicts you with the Tipsy effect
advancements.rf.farming.hoe.title: Reap What You Sow
advancements.rf.farming.hoe.description: Craft a Hoe to gather Wheat Seeds from Grass, rake through Leaves and till Dirt into Farmland
advancements.rf.farming.plant_seed.title: Farmacy
advancements.rf.farming.truffle.title: Truff Luck
advancements.rf.farming.truffle.descript: Feed a Golden Carrot to a Pig and have it lead you to some Buried Truffles - or find one in a Witch's Bag
advancements.rf.farming.all_crops.title: Plentiful Harvest
advancements.rf.farming.all_crops.descri: Obtain at least one of every single fruit, vegetable or other growable crop products
Place down some Organic Compost and let it sit for a while
advancements.rf.farming.rich_soil.title: Quality Assurance
advancements.rf.farming.rich_soil.descri: Obtain Rich Soil by letting Organic Compost decompose near sunlight, water, mushrooms or other compost blocks
advancements.rf.farming.all_hoes.title: Hoes Mad
advancements.rf.farming.all_hoes.descrip: Obtain one of every single type of Hoe
advancements.rf.farming.oven.title: Let's Bake Some Magic!
advancements.rf.farming.oven.description: Place down an Oven on a heated block like a lit Campfire or Stove to cook foods faster or make meals and baked goods
advancements.rf.farming.cooking_pot.desc: Place down a Cooking Pot on a heated block like a lit Campfire or Stove to cook meals and brew beverages with some helpful effects
advancements.rf.farming.all_pancakes.des: Use Honey, Jam, Syrup, Chocolate and Lemon to top Pancakes
advancements.rf.farming.all_cookies.desc: Bake every type of Cookie (everything made with one ingredient and Wheat Dough, including Cinnamon Crackers)
advancements.rf.farming.all_cakes.title: Not a Lie
advancements.rf.farming.all_pies.title: Pie Flavor!
advancements.rf.farming.all_pies.descrip: Bake every type of Pie (everything made with a Pie Crust)
advancements.rf.farming.feast.title: Good Eatin'
advancements.rf.farming.feast.descriptio: Make and place down any type of feast, placeable foods that you can take multiple portions out of
advancements.rf.farming.questionable_die: Eat Dog Food, Cat Food, Horse Feed, Slabdish, a Hot Cream Cone and a Blaze Tart... hey, those weren't for you!
advancements.rf.farming.ice_cubes.title: I Want Revenge!
advancements.rf.farming.flavors.title: Flavor Town
advancements.rf.farming.flavors.descript: Have the Agility, Berserking, Caffeinated, Flourishing, Harmony, Maturity, Sugar Rush, Tenacity and Vanilla Scent effects on you all at once - maybe save Vanilla Scent for last
advancements.rf.farming.potato_meals.des: Make every meal and drink that contains Potatoes
advancements.rf.farming.knife.title: Cutting Edge
advancements.rf.farming.knife.descriptio: Craft a Knife for hunting, scavenging and kitchen purposes
advancements.rf.farming.straw.title: Grasping at Straws
advancements.rf.farming.straw.descriptio: Use a Knife to harvest some Straw from Grass or crops like Wheat and Corn
advancements.rf.farming.ham.title: Ham Gone Ham Ham
advancements.rf.farming.ham.description: Deal the killing blow on a Pig or a Hoglin with a Knife for a chance to obtain Ham
advancements.rf.farming.mob_heads.title: I'ma Head Out
advancements.rf.farming.mob_heads.descri: Get lucky while using a Knife to deal the killing blow on one of a select few mobs to obtain its head
advancements.rf.farming.cloth_scrap.desc: Obtain Cloth Scrap by killing mobs such as Zombies or Witches, which you'll need to make a Bed
advancements.rf.farming.sleep.title: Nighty Night
advancements.rf.farming.sleep.descriptio: Make a Bedroll or Bed to sleep your troubles away, which will take longer than usual, but can accelerate processes such as crop growth and Furnace recipes
advancements.rf.farming.decorated_bed.de: Decorate your Bed using a Banner
advancements.rf.farming.shears.title: Snip Snip
advancements.rf.farming.shears.descripti: Craft a pair of Shears - or get your hands on a Crab Claw - to pick up plants or foliage, and shear Wool off of Sheep
advancements.rf.farming.hammer.title: Piko Piko!
advancements.rf.farming.hammer.descripti: Craft a Hammer - it'll let you manually crush up or flatten various things on a Cutting Board
advancements.rf.farming.cutting_board.de: Use a Cutting Board to cut or crush ingredients for efficient resource usage, or salvage materials from unwanted items
advancements.rf.farming.tree_bark.title: All Bark and No Bite
advancements.rf.farming.tree_bark.descri: Strip any Wood Log on a Cutting Board to obtain Tree Bark
advancements.rf.farming.copper_patina.de: Scrape any Oxidized Copper block on a Cutting Board to obtain Copper Patina
advancements.rf.farming.cinnamon_challen: Consume raw Cinnamon and suffer the consequences
advancements.rf.exploration.root.title: Exploration & Discovery
advancements.rf.exploration.bomb.title: It's Yours, My Friend
advancements.rf.exploration.creeper_spor: Throw Creeper Spores to summon a bunch of friendly Creepies that will go after aggressors
advancements.rf.exploration.aftershock.d: Get struck by lightning while wearing a piece of Copper armor and gain the Aftershock effect
advancements.rf.exploration.bundle.title: Bundle Up
advancements.rf.exploration.bundle.descr: Obtain a Bundle to carry more types of items while using up less space - you can even dye them
advancements.rf.exploration.quiver.title: To the Knee
advancements.rf.exploration.quiver.descr: Obtain a Quiver - it can hold up to 6 stacks of Arrows and will let you carry multiple Arrow types in one slot
advancements.rf.exploration.sack.title: Hit the Sack
advancements.rf.exploration.sack.descrip: Obtain a Sack to carry up to 12 extra slots of items - you can dye these, too
advancements.rf.exploration.terrabin.des: Obtain a Terrabin to carry up to a whopping 27 extra slots of items - yep, you can also dye these
advancements.rf.exploration.tame.title: Got a Friend in Me
advancements.rf.exploration.flute.title: Ocarina Time!
advancements.rf.exploration.flute.descri: Obtain a Flute - it can be assigned to pets and then used to call them to your location
advancements.rf.exploration.summon_golem: Summon an Iron Golem with four Iron Blocks in a T-shape and a Carved Pumpkin on top, or a Copper Golem with a Lightning Rod on top of a Carved Pumpkin
advancements.rf.exploration.tune_golem.d: Right-click on a Copper or Iron Golem with a Tuning Fork that's been tuned using a Note Block to bind the Golem to the Fork
advancements.rf.exploration.repair_golem: Repair an Iron Golem with an Iron Ingot, or a Copper Golem with a Copper Ingot
advancements.rf.exploration.summon_tuff_: Summon a Tuff Golem with Wool and a Carved Pumpkin on top of Tuff
advancements.rf.exploration.navigation_t: Obtain a Compass and Depth Gauge - they'll display your latitude, altitude and longitude (your X, Y and Z coordinates)
advancements.rf.exploration.lodestone.de: Place down a Lodestone, then use a Compass on it to have the Compass always point towards that Lodestone
advancements.rf.exploration.adventure_to: Obtain a Spyglass and Atlas - they'll come in handy on long expeditions
advancements.rf.exploration.mushroom_fie: Come across a Mushroom Fields biome
advancements.rf.exploration.all_ores.des: Collect every ore in pure block form using a Rose Gold Pickaxe
advancements.rf.exploration.all_wood.des: Collect every type of Log or Wood
advancements.rf.exploration.ocean_monume: Locate an Ocean Monument, home of the Guardians
advancements.rf.exploration.conduit.desc: Using a Heart of the Sea and Nautilus Shells, create a Conduit and power it by surrounding it with Prismarine blocks
advancements.rf.exploration.exopearls.de: Make Awoken or Spirited Exopearls to locate various structures - use them sparingly, as they have a small chance to shatter after being used
advancements.rf.exploration.peeper.title: Staring Contest
advancements.rf.exploration.peeper.descr: Get spotted by a Peeper - only look away when you have to...
advancements.rf.exploration.dungeon.desc: Come across any type of dungeon - Spirited Exopearls can locate them
advancements.rf.exploration.fragile_ston: Mine into some Fragile Stone or Deepslate, but be careful - mining just one block will cause all connected Fragile blocks to crumble too
Obtain a Dwarf Geode - crack them open or crush them for some ore nuggets
advancements.rf.exploration.silver_mirro: Obtain a Silver Mirror - it can detect nearby Silver Ore, and hitting undead with it will create a trail that leads to the nearest Silver vein
advancements.rf.exploration.jukebox.desc: Place down a Jukebox and get musical
advancements.rf.exploration.eleven.title: Mending Broken Memories
advancements.rf.exploration.pyramid.desc: Stumble upon a Desert, Badlands or Jungle Pyramid
advancements.rf.exploration.ancient_city: Discover an Ancient City deep down underground
Against all odds, overpower the Warden
advancements.rf.exploration.totem_of_und: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death
advancements.rf.exploration.all_relics.d: Collect the four ancient relics scattered around the world
advancements.rf.exploration.ruined_porta: Find a Ruined Portal - Awoken Exopearls can locate them
advancements.rf.exploration.lachryte_tea: Obtain a Lachryte Tear, most commonly available through crushing Exopearls or extracting it from Crying Obsidian
advancements.rf.exploration.dimensional_: Melt down Lachryte Tears in a Forge to obtain a Bottle of Liquefied Lachryte
advancements.rf.exploration.nether.title: We Need to Go Deeper
advancements.rf.exploration.nether.descr: Using a Bottle of Liquefied Lachryte on a frame made of Obsidian, open a portal to the Nether and enter it
advancements.rf.exploration.kill_ghast_f: Kill a Ghast by deflecting its fireball back at it
advancements.rf.exploration.kill_wildfir: Find and defeat a Wildfire in a Nether Fortress
advancements.rf.exploration.wither_skele: Get lucky when killing a Withered to obtain its skull - a Golden Sword or Knife might help speed things up
advancements.rf.exploration.summon_withe: Assemble four Soul Sand or Soul Soil blocks in a T-shape and place three Withered Skulls on top to summon the Wither
advancements.rf.exploration.stardust.des: Using Crushing Wheels, crush a Nether Star into Stardust
advancements.rf.exploration.beacon.title: The Light of Hope
advancements.rf.exploration.beacon.descr: Using a Nether Star, craft a Beacon and power it by placing it on a pyramid of valuable blocks
Construct a maximum level Beacon, with 5 layers of resource blocks
advancements.rf.machines.root.title: Machines & Contraptions
advancements.rf.machines.root.descriptio: The age of machinery is upon us!
advancements.rf.machines.redstone.title: Red Power
advancements.rf.machines.redstone.descri: Polish some Rough Cinnabar and then crush it to obtain Redstone Dust
advancements.rf.machines.explosive.title: And Kablooey!
advancements.rf.machines.explosive.descr: Obtain some Dynamite - all ores are blast resistant, so explosives may come in handy for your next mining expedition
advancements.rf.machines.redstone_connec: Place down some Redstone Connectors for a much more compact way of conducting Redstone power vertically, around corners, or other tricky places
advancements.rf.machines.item_movement.d: Place down some Hoppers and Item Pipes to move items around
advancements.rf.machines.sturdy_alloy.de: Combine any Sturdy Stone and Zinc to make Sturdy Alloy, a material essential for realizing all your mechanical dreams
advancements.rf.machines.water_wheel.des: Place down a regular or large Water Wheel to start getting some automatic Rotational Power going
advancements.rf.machines.millstone.title: Hot Mills in Your Area
advancements.rf.machines.millstone.descr: Place down a Millstone for an easy and compact way to crush up materials and ingredients
advancements.rf.machines.windmill_bearin: Place down a Windmill Bearing to start preparing a windmill as a powerful and even more aesthetically pleasing Rotational Power source
advancements.rf.machines.steam_engine.de: Place down a Steam Engine on a Fluid Tank to start preparing a steam boiler, a hard to maintain source of Rotational Power with a lot of potential
advancements.rf.machines.mechanical_craf: Place down Mechanical Crafters to start crafting recipes automatically - you'll need them to craft more advanced items like Diamond armor, and they can even craft recipes bigger than a 3x3 space
advancements.rf.machines.item_magnet.des: Obtain an Item Magnet - activating one via right-click will make it attract nearby items towards you
advancements.rf.machines.extendo_grip.de: Obtain an Extendo Grip to increase your reach
advancements.rf.machines.mechanical_pres: Place down a Mechanical Press to start pressing materials and ingredients like Ingots or Wheat
advancements.rf.machines.item_vault.desc: Place down an Item Vault - multiple Vaults can be combined together to create bigger Vaults, but they can't be accessed directly like other containers
advancements.rf.machines.item_drawer.des: Place down an Item Drawer - it can store up to 80 stacks of a single type of item
advancements.rf.machines.mechanical_harv: Place down some Mechanical Harvesters to get started on an automatic crop farm
advancements.rf.machines.engineering_too: Craft an Engineer's Wrench, a pair of Engineer's Goggles and a Toolbox to make it easier than ever to interact with your contraptions and carry things around
advancements.rf.machines.mechanical_mixe: Place down a Mechanical Mixer over a Basin to start mixing ingredients and materials
advancements.rf.machines.blaze_burner.de: Find a Nether Fortress and capture a Blaze inside of a Blaze Burner
advancements.rf.machines.superheating.de: Feed a Blaze Tart to a Blaze Burner to super-heat it
advancements.rf.machines.latex.title: Latex Treks
advancements.rf.machines.latex.descripti: Right-click on a Latex Jungle Log or Latex Rosewood Log with a glass bottle to obtain Latex - or find a bottle of it somewhere
advancements.rf.machines.rubber.title: It's a Ball!
advancements.rf.machines.rubber.descript: Mix some Latex, Gunpowder and Zinc in a heated mixer to obtain Rubber
advancements.rf.machines.brass.title: Brass, Brass, Brass!
advancements.rf.machines.brass.descripti: Mix some Copper and Zinc with a heated mixer to obtain Brass
Place down storage blocks, a Storage Interface and a Storage Terminal to start creating a simpler storage system (these blocks may not exist forever!)
advancements.rf.machines.rotation_speed_: Place down Rotation Speed Controllers to be able to precisely control and configure the rotation speed of your contraptions
Place down Mechanical Arms to more precisely move items between containers and workstations
advancements.rf.machines.deployer.title: Deploy This!
advancements.rf.machines.deployer.descri: Place down a Deployer to do your otherwise manual work automatically - it can cut stuff on a Cutting Board, polish stuff with Sandpaper or a Grindstone, shear Wool off of Sheep, and more
advancements.rf.machines.precision_mecha: Through a Sequenced Assembly using Deployers, create Precision Mechanisms
advancements.rf.machines.train_tracks.de: Through crafting or a Sequenced Assembly using Deployers, create Train Tracks
advancements.rf.machines.steel.title: Post-Irony
advancements.rf.machines.steel.descripti: Mix some Iron, Lead and Blaze Powder with a heated mixer to obtain Steel
advancements.rf.machines.crushing_wheels: Using Mechanical Crafters, craft a pair of Crushing Wheels - they're much stronger than Millstones, but harder to set up and power sufficiently
Place down an Industrial Fan to pull and push entities, or process materials by blowing fire, water or lava
Place down a Mechanical Saw to cut blocks up or use it to chop down trees in one fell swoop
advancements.rf.machines.mechanical_dril: I Repeat, This is a Drill!
Place down a Mechanical Drill to start mining blocks automatically - time to invest in a giant tunnel bore!
